languages.text: {n}Когда биение сердца в груди чуть стихает, а дыхание выравнивается, вы осознаете, что предназначенная вам пуля... почему-то не настигла вас. Рядом, тяжело дыша, Кибелла смахивает с клинка остатки крови. Алое пятно расползается в ее боку слишком быстро — кровь по одеждам стекает на пол... Голова Немезита лежит отсеченная у ее ног. Все кончено.{/n}
languages.translation_comment:
Кибелла подскакивает к Немезиту и отсекает ему голову
вешаем на Кибеллу NemesiteShotKibellah_buff
стартует этюд NemesiteShotKibellah

traits.locale_text: {n}Когда биение сердца в груди чуть стихает, а дыхание выравнивается, вы осознаете, что предназначенная вам пуля... почему-то не настигла вас. Рядом, тяжело дыша, Кибелла смахивает с клинка остатки крови. Алое пятно расползается в ее боку слишком быстро — кровь по одеждам стекает на пол... И вы лишь сейчас замечаете, что голова Немезита лежит отсеченная у ее ног. Все кончено.{/n}

languages.translation_comment:
Кибелла подскакивает к Немезиту и отсекает ему голову
вешаем на Кибеллу NemesiteShotKibellah_buff
стартует этюд NemesiteShotKibellah

languages.text: {n}Once your heartbeat calms down and your breathing evens out, you realise that the bullet that was meant for you... has somehow failed to hit its mark. Kibellah is standing next to you, still breathing heavily as she wipes her blade. A scarlet stain is spreading quickly along her side, blood soaking her clothes and trickling down to the floor. Nemesite's head lies severed at her feet. It is over.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Когда биение сердца в груди чуть стихает, а дыхание выравнивается, вы осознаете, что предназначенная вам пуля... почему-то не настигла вас. Рядом, тяжело дыша, Кибелла смахивает с клинка остатки крови. Алое пятно расползается в ее боку слишком быстро — кровь по одеждам стекает на пол... Голова Немезита лежит отсеченная у ее ног. Все кончено.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Once your heartbeat calms and your breathing evens, you realise that the bullet that was meant for you... has somehow failed to hit its mark. Kibellah is standing next to you, still breathing heavily as she wipes the blood off her blade. A scarlet stain quickly spreads along her side, blood soaking her clothes and running down to the floor. Nemesite's head lies severed at her feet. It is over.{/n}

{n}Leaving behind a bloody trace, Kibellah dashes toward Nemesis who is staring at the hole in his chest in astonishment. Her blade whistles, and the head of the living legend rolls to the deck. It is over.{/n}

{n}Once your heartbeat calms down and your breath returns to normal, you realise that the bullet that was meant for you... has somehow failed to hit its mark. Kibellah is standing next to you, still breathing heavily as she wipes the gore off her blade. A scarlet stain is spreading quickly along her side, blood soaking her clothes and trickling down to the floor. Nemesite's head lies severed at her feet. It is over.{/n}

{n}Once your heartbeat calms down and your breath returns to normal, you realise that the bullet that was meant for you... has somehow failed to hit its mark. Kibellah is standing next to you, still breathing heavily as she wipes the gore off her blade. A scarlet stain is spreading quickly along her side, blood soaking her clothes and trickling down to the floor. Nemesite's head lies severed at her feet. It is over.{/n}

{n}Once your heartbeat calms down and your breathing evens out, you realise that the bullet that was meant for you... has somehow failed to hit its mark. Kibellah is standing next to you, still breathing heavily as she wipes her blade. A scarlet stain is spreading quickly along her side, blood soaking her clothes and trickling down to the floor. Nemesite's head lies severed at her feet. It is over.{/n}

{n}Once your heartbeat calms and your breathing evens, you realise that the bullet that was meant for you... has somehow failed to hit its mark. Kibellah is standing next to you, still breathing heavily as she wipes the blood off her blade. A scarlet stain quickly spreads along her side, blood soaking her clothes and running down to the floor. Nemesite's head lies severed at her feet. It is over.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Als sich dein Herzschlag und deine Atmung beruhigen, erkennst du, dass die für dich bestimmte Kugel ... ihr Ziel irgendwie verfehlt hat. Kibellah steht immer noch schwer atmend neben dir und wischt ihre Klinge ab. An ihrer Flanke bildet sich ein roter Fleck, als Blut ihre Kleidung durchtränkt und zu Boden tropft. Nemesits abgetrennter Kopf liegt vor ihr. Es ist vorbei.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Once your heartbeat calms down and your breathing evens out, you realise that the bullet that was meant for you... has somehow failed to hit its mark. Kibellah is standing next to you, still breathing heavily as she wipes her blade. A scarlet stain is spreading quickly along her side, blood soaking her clothes and trickling down to the floor. Nemesite's head lies severed at her feet. It is over.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Als sich dein Herzschlag und deine Atmung beruhigen, erkennst du, dass die für dich bestimmte Kugel ... ihr Ziel irgendwie verfehlt hat. Kibellah steht immer noch schwer atmend neben dir und wischt ihre Klinge ab. An ihrer Flanke bildet sich ein roter Fleck, als Blut ihre Kleidung durchtränkt und zu Boden tropft. Nemesits abgetrennter Kopf liegt vor ihr. Es ist vorbei.{/n}

{n}Kibellah hinterlässt eine blutige Spur und stürzt sich auf Nemesit, der erstaunt auf das Loch in seiner Brust blickt. Ihre Klinge pfeift, und der Kopf einer lebenden Legende rollt über das Deck. Es ist vorbei.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cuando los latidos de tu corazón se serenan y tu respiración se estabiliza, adviertes que la bala disparada contra ti ha errado el blanco de alguna manera. Kibellah está junto a ti, limpiando su daga sin dejar de jadear. Una mancha escarlata se extiende rápidamente por su costado, empapando su ropa y goteando al suelo. La cabeza cercenada de Nemesitio yace a sus pies. Se acabó.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Once your heartbeat calms down and your breathing evens out, you realise that the bullet that was meant for you... has somehow failed to hit its mark. Kibellah is standing next to you, still breathing heavily as she wipes her blade. A scarlet stain is spreading quickly along her side, blood soaking her clothes and trickling down to the floor. Nemesite's head lies severed at her feet. It is over.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cuando los latidos de tu corazón se serenan y tu respiración se estabiliza, adviertes que la bala disparada contra ti ha errado el blanco de alguna manera. Kibellah está junto a ti, limpiando su daga sin dejar de jadear. Una mancha escarlata se extiende rápidamente por su costado, empapando su ropa y goteando al suelo. La cabeza cercenada de Nemesitio yace a sus pies. Se acabó.{/n}

{n}Dejando un rastro sangriento tras de sí, Kibellah se abalanza contra Nemesitio, que contempla atónito el agujero de su pecho. Su daga silba y la cabeza de la leyenda viva cae al suelo de la cubierta. Se acabó.{/n}

languages.text: {n}}鼓動が落ち着き、呼吸の乱れがなくなった時、自分を狙っていたはずの弾丸が…なぜか命中しなかったことに気づく。キベラはあなたの隣に立っており、ブレードをぬぐいつつまだ荒く息をついている。緋色の染みが、その脇腹に沿って一気に広がる。血が服を濡らし、床へと流れ落ち…ネメサイトの切り落とされた首が彼女の足元に転がる。これで終わりだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Once your heartbeat calms down and your breathing evens out, you realise that the bullet that was meant for you... has somehow failed to hit its mark. Kibellah is standing next to you, still breathing heavily as she wipes her blade. A scarlet stain is spreading quickly along her side, blood soaking her clothes and trickling down to the floor. Nemesite's head lies severed at her feet. It is over.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}}鼓動が落ち着き、呼吸の乱れがなくなった時、自分を狙っていたはずの弾丸が…なぜか命中しなかったことに気づく。キベラはあなたの隣に立っており、ブレードをぬぐいつつまだ荒く息をついている。緋色の染みが、その脇腹に沿って一気に広がる。血が服を濡らし、床へと流れ落ち…ネメサイトの切り落とされた首が彼女の足元に転がる。これで終わりだ。{/n}
{n}血の跡を残しながら、キベラはネメサイトに向かってダッシュした。彼女の刃が音をたて、生ける伝説の首がデッキに転がる。これで終わりだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}当你的心跳平静下来，呼吸也变得平稳之后，你猛然意识到，涅墨斯特那颗子弹明明是朝你射来的……但由于某种原因没能击中你。绮贝菈站在你身边，一边擦着刀锋上的血迹，一边喘着粗气。一团鲜红色的污渍沿着她的身体迅速蔓延，鲜血浸透了她的衣服，流到了地面上。涅墨斯特的头已经被砍了下来，落在了她的脚边。一切都结束了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Once your heartbeat calms down and your breathing evens out, you realise that the bullet that was meant for you... has somehow failed to hit its mark. Kibellah is standing next to you, still breathing heavily as she wipes her blade. A scarlet stain is spreading quickly along her side, blood soaking her clothes and trickling down to the floor. Nemesite's head lies severed at her feet. It is over.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}当你的心跳平静下来，呼吸也变得平稳之后，你猛然意识到，涅墨斯特那颗子弹明明是朝你射来的……但由于某种原因没能击中你。绮贝菈站在你身边，一边擦着刀锋上的血迹，一边喘着粗气。一团鲜红色的污渍沿着她的身体迅速蔓延，鲜血浸透了她的衣服，流到了地面上。涅墨斯特的头已经被砍了下来，落在了她的脚边。一切都结束了。{/n}
{n}绮贝菈朝涅墨斯特冲了过去，身后留下了一串血迹。涅墨斯特惊讶地盯着胸口的大洞，绮贝菈的刀锋闪过，这位传奇人物的脑袋滚到了甲板上。一切都结束了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Quand les battements de votre cœur finissent par se calmer et votre respiration par retrouver sa régularité, vous comprenez que, pour une raison que vous ne vous expliquez pas, la balle qui vous était destinée a manqué sa cible. À côté de vous, Kibellah essuie sa lame, le souffle court. Sur son flanc, une tache écarlate s'élargit rapidement à mesure que le sang imbibe ses vêtements et goutte lentement sur le sol. La tête tranchée de Némésite gît à ses pieds. Votre ennemi n'est plus.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Once your heartbeat calms down and your breathing evens out, you realise that the bullet that was meant for you... has somehow failed to hit its mark. Kibellah is standing next to you, still breathing heavily as she wipes her blade. A scarlet stain is spreading quickly along her side, blood soaking her clothes and trickling down to the floor. Nemesite's head lies severed at her feet. It is over.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Quand les battements de votre cœur finissent par se calmer et votre respiration par retrouver sa régularité, vous comprenez que, pour une raison que vous ne vous expliquez pas, la balle qui vous était destinée a manqué sa cible. À côté de vous, Kibellah essuie sa lame, le souffle court. Sur son flanc, une tache écarlate s'élargit rapidement à mesure que le sang imbibe ses vêtements et goutte lentement sur le sol. La tête tranchée de Némésite gît à ses pieds. Votre ennemi n'est plus.{/n}

{n}Laissant derrière elle une traînée sanglante, Kibellah se rue sur Némésite qui regarde avec stupéfaction le trou dans sa poitrine. Sa lame fend l'air en sifflant et la tête d'une légende vivante roule sur le pont. Votre ennemi n'est plus.{/n}
